meanings.definition: A season of the year between winter and summer.
meanings.sent1: In spring, flowers bloom and trees grow new leaves.
meanings.sent2: I love going for walks in the park during spring.
meanings.sent3: The spring weather makes me want to go outside and play.
meanings.sent4: The arrival of spring brings a burst of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: During spring, the days get longer and the weather gets warmer.

meanings.definition: A coiled or curved mechanical device used to store and release energy.
meanings.sent1: The spring in the clock helps it keep time accurately.
meanings.sent2: When you wind up a toy car, you are storing energy in the spring.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally let go of the spring, and it bounced away.
meanings.sent4: The spring in the pen allows the ink to flow smoothly onto the paper.
meanings.sent5: The spring in the trampoline gives it its bounce.

meanings.definition: To move or jump suddenly or rapidly.
meanings.sent1: The cat can spring up onto the counter with ease.
meanings.sent2: I saw the squirrel spring from one tree to another.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party made him spring out of his chair.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden question made him spring to attention.
meanings.sent5: The athlete can spring over hurdles effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A source of water flowing from the ground.
meanings.sent1: The natural spring in the forest provides fresh water.
meanings.sent2: People used to rely on springs for drinking water.
meanings.sent3: The animals gathered around the spring to quench their thirst.
meanings.sent4: The spring in the valley is a peaceful spot for picnics.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bubbling spring is soothing to the ears.

meanings.sent1: Ideas can spring from unexpected places.
meanings.sent2: The solution to the problem sprang to mind out of nowhere.
meanings.sent3: Laughter can spring from the silliest jokes.
meanings.sent4: Confidence can spring up when you least expect it.
meanings.sent5: Hope can spring eternal even in difficult times.
